Cards

Use cards to draw users attention to specific content.

  1. Highlight card
  2. Section button

1. Highlight card

Use highlight cards to highlight content within a page, or to break certain snippets of content away from the rest of the page.

Highlight Info Card Heading

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed pharetra est id elit auctor tristique. â€¨Aliquam vestibulum gravida mi eu ornare. Aenean tristique ac leo at eleifend.

  • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing.
  • Dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam.
  • Commodo consequat duis aute irure dolor in.
  • Labore et dolore magna aliqua occaecat.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet

HTML goes here.
Angular example usage:
<section class="card"> <h6 *ngIf="title">Highlight Info Card Heading</h6> <div> <ng-content> <p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed pharetra est id elit auctor tristique. Aliquam vestibulum gravida mi eu ornare. Aenean tristique ac leo at eleifend. </p> <ul> <li>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing.</li> <li>Dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam.</li> <li>Commodo consequat duis aute irure dolor in.</li> <li>Labore et dolore magna aliqua occaecat.</li> </ul> <p><a href="#">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet</a></p> </ng-content> </div> </section>

Angular component:
                import {Component, Input, OnInit} from '@angular/core';

@Component({
                    selector: 'app-card',
                    templateUrl: './card.component.html',
                    styleUrls: ['./card.component.scss']
})
export class CardComponent implements OnInit {
                    @Input() public title = '';

                    constructor() { }

  ngOnInit() {
  }

}
Angular template:
                <section class="card">
  <h6 *ngIf="title">{{ title }}</h6>
  <div>
    <ng-content></ng-content>
  </div>
</section>

2. Section card

Use section cards to break content into sections, for example, field sets on a webform.

Contact details



HTML goes here.
Angular example usage:
<section class="card"> <h6 *ngIf="title">Contact details</h6> <div> <ng-content> <form> <input type="text" placeholder="First name"/><br> <input type="text" placeholder="Last name"/><br> <input type="text" placeholder="Email address"/><br> </form> </ng-content> </div> </section>

Angular component:
                import {Component, Input, OnInit} from '@angular/core';

@Component({
                    selector: 'app-card',
                    templateUrl: './card.component.html',
                    styleUrls: ['./card.component.scss']
})
export class CardComponent implements OnInit {
                    @Input() public title = '';

                    constructor() { }

  ngOnInit() {
  }

}
Angular template:
                <section class="card">
  <h6 *ngIf="title">{{ title }}</h6>
  <div>
    <ng-content></ng-content>
  </div>
</section>
